name: ITM House
tagline: All your technology needs under one roof!
description:
ITM House Inc. is a technologically agile software development company headquartered in Toronto, Canada. 
ITM House Inc. is constantly targeting on more value for our clients, putting their interests ahead of ours and delivering value that goes beyond the contract. Our expertise is rooted into years of direct, front-line experience as well as deep industry knowledge to ensure our clients' success. ITM House Inc. provides spectrum of services in developing software products for various purposes and areas of application – from mobile device apps to complex systems customized for work with electronic documents and databases. ITM House Inc. also has number of successful projects in area of outsourcing with partners around the globe.
READ MORE...
